content: *liza is a long sleeved evening cardigan crocheted in mesh and shell stitches berroco * skill level intermediate finished measurements bust - 34 38-42 length 20½ 21-22 not including edging materials berroco lumina 25 grs 7 7-9 hanks #1643 goldie noir crochet hook size 5 00 mm h or size to obtain gauge gauge 4½ v-st groups = 4 10 row = 4 in pat st with size 5 00 mm h crochet hook schematics are provided ed note photograph shows a pin-type closure which is not specified in the instructions
